page.title: 14 TRANSPORT.
page.content: In this area there are 3 main types of transport.There are cars,buses and the Metro. BUSES.:The buses in this area are yellow and white in colour.Most of the buses are single deckers,although a few are double deckers.The majority of buses are "Pay as you enter". METRO.:This is a modern system of transport for the area.It links with buses from North and South of the River Tyne in order to transport people in and out of Newcastle.The "trains" run regulary(every ten minutes)and use electricity to power them.Because of this they can be said to be "Pollution Free". CARS.:Most people have cars to travel to and from their work,however the public transport system is regular and very reliable.
